product_title: FREEZE DRIED USA Double Strawberry Swirl Ice Cream Bites (4 oz) - Unique Novelty Gift for Birthdays, Christmas, Easter - Exciting No-Mess, No-Melt Dessert - Hiking, Camping, Party Snack: Strawberry Swirl

reviews.title: Yum Yum and more Yum
reviews.content: I love freeze dried ice cream and used to buy tons of those old triple-flavor slices that were freeze dried.  Well I can no longer find those.  I can only find the ice cream sandwiches and I don't like those.  I thought I would try these to get at least one of the flavors.  They were PERFECT!  Lots of strawberry taste and nice bite sizes.  Good seal on the package.  Although--once I got started no like I was needing to seal any away.....  Highly recommend.
reviews.author: Amazon Customer
reviews.product: FREEZE DRIED USA Double Strawberry Swirl Ice Cream Bites (4 oz) - Unique Novelty Gift for Birthdays, Christmas, Easter - Exciting No-Mess, No-Melt Dessert - Hiking, Camping, Party Snack: Strawberry Swirl

reviews.title: Tastes just like icecream!
reviews.content: This is SOOOOO GOOD! Melts in your mouth strawberry Icecream flavor.

reviews.content: Literally 1 minutes after order I devoured it. The cost it is a bit expensive but honestly it’s worth it. You can’t get anything cheaper and better than this.

reviews.content: very tasty and fresh. Only problem is there were not enough in the pack, ate it all in one sitting. Guess the quantity is a good thing.

reviews.title: Tasty but couldn’t get through the texture
reviews.content: These were very tasty I just couldn’t get through the texture. It similar to a nail scratching a chalk board.
reviews.author: Danielle M
reviews.product: FREEZE DRIED USA Double Strawberry Swirl Ice Cream Bites (4 oz) - Unique Novelty Gift for Birthdays, Christmas, Easter - Exciting No-Mess, No-Melt Dessert - Hiking, Camping, Party Snack: Strawberry Swirl

reviews.title: Sooooo yummy!
reviews.content: I LOVED these. I was shocked to see how many strawberries were swirled the product. I am definitely buying more. I ate them all in one sitting lol. I hate that they are a little pricey BUT I understand the effort that goes into making them. There is no doubt they are worth the money. I always bought the freeze dried I cream with the space ship on it. This brand is so much better and I feel like time was taken on their product. I’ll be ordering more soon!
reviews.author: Amanda
reviews.product: FREEZE DRIED USA Double Strawberry Swirl Ice Cream Bites (4 oz) - Unique Novelty Gift for Birthdays, Christmas, Easter - Exciting No-Mess, No-Melt Dessert - Hiking, Camping, Party Snack: Strawberry Swirl

reviews.title: Tastes fantastic
reviews.content: The product was wonderful, and they even sent a free sample of thw freeze dried Laffy taffy which was incredible and I will be purchasing more. Sadly it's a little expensive so I can't get it as often as I would like, but I will definitely get more.

reviews.title: Yummy! Looks exactly as pictured, tastes just as good!
reviews.content: Crispy, melt-in your mouth, and generous portions for a freeze dried good. 4oz dried weight means you'll get around a pint of scooped ice cream. Careful! IT's easy to demolish a whole bag. A pint of ice cream is a lot easier to eat in one sitting when there's no water left in it!

reviews.title: Ridiculously good!
reviews.content: As the headline implies, these little freeze-dried treats are unbelievably good.  Well packaged and totally free of moisture.  We will most certainly be sampling the other flavors!  Purchased the Butter Pecan flavor as well.  Equally ridiculous!

reviews.title: Best Freeze dried ice cream
reviews.content: I bought all 4 flavors, loved all 4! I'd like to say that freeze-dried ice cream is one of my favorite sweet treats, if you are someone who loves F-Ded ice cream, then look no further! As long as this product is available then I will be ordering this. Perfect size, great value, creamy/smooth & the best flavor! Seller is great, price is great and products arrived on time!

reviews.title: Great Value
reviews.content: This takes space Ice cream to the next level. I love strawberry ice cream and this was among some of the best. 4oz is a lotttt of value for a freeze dried item too. Cant wait to try their other flavors though I have a feeling this one will remain my favorite. The little bits of real strawberries are a nice touch too its not just flavored.
